BackstoryDef.title: Post-war Undertaker
BackstoryDef.description: Life in the wasteland was often brutal, arduous and short. Some of the larger settlements employed an undertaker. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of those undertakers and [PAWN_possessive] job was to dig graves and bury those whose lives were claimed by raiders, radiation, mutated beasts and, occasionally, old age.

BackstoryDef.title: Post-war Bodyguard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living by protecting affluent customers from the dangers of the wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] protected wealthy caravaners, important officials from everything and everyone that would harm them, as long as they paid of course. While it may have been less lethal than working as a mercenary, it was still dangerous and [PAWN_nameDef] had the scars to prove it.

BackstoryDef.title: Pre-war Gourmet
BackstoryDef.description: Just the thought of eating radroaches or molerats made [PAWN_nameDef] shiver with disgust. [PAWN_pronoun] was what some called an old-world gourmet and preferred to dine on ancient rations of canned meat, mac and cheese and Salisbury steak. While most members of [PAWN_possessive] community only shook their heads at [PAWN_possessive] behaviour, none could argue that [PAWN_pronoun] was indeed a good cook.

BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland Scavenger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] survived by picking through ruins and forgotten vaults, always searching for something valuable. Years of scavenging made [PAWN_pronoun] resourceful, but wary of strangers.

BackstoryDef.title: Pre-war Historian
BackstoryDef.description: Before the bombs fell, [PAWN_nameDef] was a keeper of knowledge. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] is a living relic, sharing stories of the old world with anyone who will listen.

BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland Bartender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a bar in a half-collapsed building, serving drinks and advice to travelers and locals alike. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to listen, and to break up the occasional brawl.

BackstoryDef.title: Tunnel Rat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent decades living in subway tunnels and sewers, avoiding the sun and surface dangers. [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at moving unseen and surviving in the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: Pre-war Doctor
BackstoryDef.description: Once a respected physician, [PAWN_nameDef] now uses [PAWN_possessive] knowledge to patch up wounds and treat radiation sickness in the wasteland.

BackstoryDef.title: Caravan Guard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years escorting caravans across the wasteland, fending off raiders and mutants. [PAWN_pronoun] is always alert for danger.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault Janitor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] kept the vault clean and running, fixing leaks and unclogging pipes. After the bombs, [PAWN_pronoun] just kept working, even as the vault fell apart.

BackstoryDef.title: Pre-war Entertainer
BackstoryDef.description: Once a singer or comedian, [PAWN_nameDef] now entertains wastelanders with tales and songs from a world long gone.

BackstoryDef.title: Feral Survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years on the edge of feral madness, surviving by instinct alone. [PAWN_pronoun] is tough, but struggles to relate to others.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] fixed cars, robots, and anything else with moving parts before the war. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] keeps battered machines running in the wasteland.

BackstoryDef.title: Chem Cook
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years brewing chems in hidden labs. [PAWN_pronoun] knows the dangers of addiction and the value of a steady hand.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Teacher
BackstoryDef.description: Once a teacher in a pre-war school, [PAWN_nameDef] now tries to pass on knowledge to the next generation, even if few care to listen.

BackstoryDef.title: Scrap Artist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] turned junk into art, making sculptures from twisted metal and broken glass. [PAWN_pronoun] sees beauty where others see only ruin.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Outcast
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once ran with a vicious raider gang, but was cast out for being too different. [PAWN_pronoun] is tough, but trust is hard to earn.

BackstoryDef.title: Pre-war Bureaucrat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] shuffled papers in a government office before the bombs. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] uses [PAWN_possessive] organizational skills to keep settlements running.

BackstoryDef.title: Rot Farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tended mutated crops in irradiated soil, growing food others wouldn't dare touch. [PAWN_pronoun] is hardy and knows how to survive on little.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Cop
BackstoryDef.description: Before the war, [PAWN_nameDef] enforced the law. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] keeps order as best [PAWN_pronoun] can in a lawless world.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault Technician
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the vault's systems, keeping lights on and doors sealed. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled with machines and electronics.

BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland Preacher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the wastes, spreading hope and faith to those who would listen. [PAWN_pronoun] is a skilled orator and counselor.

BackstoryDef.title: Feral Hunter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] stalked the wilds, hunting mutated beasts for food and sport. [PAWN_pronoun] is fierce and knows how to track prey.

BackstoryDef.title: Radio Operator
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years maintaining and operating old-world radio towers, relaying messages across the wastes. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled with electronics and communication.

BackstoryDef.title: Relic Hunter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] scoured ruins for valuable pre-war artifacts, trading them for supplies. [PAWN_pronoun] has a keen eye for hidden treasures.

BackstoryDef.title: Mutant Wrangler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in capturing and taming mutated creatures for settlements and traders. [PAWN_pronoun] is fearless around beasts.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Chef
BackstoryDef.description: Before the war, [PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned chef. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] makes the best of wasteland ingredients to feed survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: Scrap Merchant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] bought and sold scrap, bartering with travelers and settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] knows the value of everything and the price of trust.

BackstoryDef.title: Grave Robber
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living digging up graves and looting the dead. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled at moving quietly and finding hidden things.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Actor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once performed on stage and screen. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] entertains with stories and impersonations of a lost world.

BackstoryDef.title: Tunnel Dweller
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived for decades in the dark tunnels beneath ruined cities, emerging only when necessary. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to darkness and silence.

BackstoryDef.title: Old World Nurse
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the sick and wounded before the bombs. [PAWN_pronoun] still tends to the injured, using both old and new techniques.

BackstoryDef.title: Scrap Sculptor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] welded together art from the ruins, creating beauty from destruction. [PAWN_pronoun] is creative and skilled with tools.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Shaman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was revered among ghouls for [PAWN_possessive] ability to withstand and channel radiation. [PAWN_pronoun] guided others through the most irradiated places, believing the glow was a blessing.

BackstoryDef.title: Radstorm Survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] survived a catastrophic radstorm that would have killed most. The experience left [PAWN_pronoun] glowing and forever changed, but also strangely invigorated.

BackstoryDef.title: Irradiated Healer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to use [PAWN_possessive] own radioactive touch to heal other ghouls, easing their pain and closing wounds with a strange, glowing energy.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Cultist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worshipped the glow, preaching to others about the cleansing power of radiation. [PAWN_pronoun] is zealous and persuasive, but sometimes unhinged.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Warden
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the entrances to highly irradiated zones, warning or driving off those who could not survive the glow. [PAWN_pronoun] is vigilant and intimidating.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Prophet
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] claimed to receive visions from the radioactive storms, guiding others with cryptic warnings and prophecies.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Shepherd
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] led groups of ghouls through the most dangerous, glowing wastelands, keeping them safe from both radiation and predators.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Hermit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone in a radioactive crater, shunned by others but at peace with the glow. [PAWN_pronoun] is self-sufficient and rarely speaks.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Pilgrim
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the world seeking places of great radiation, believing each journey brought [PAWN_pronoun] closer to enlightenment.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Outcast
BackstoryDef.description: Feared even by other ghouls, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to live on the fringes of society, surviving on whatever [PAWN_pronoun] could scavenge from the most irradiated ruins.

BackstoryDef.title: Rad Mystic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] claimed to see visions in the radioactive haze, interpreting omens for fellow ghouls. [PAWN_pronoun] is respected for [PAWN_possessive] insight and strange wisdom.

BackstoryDef.title: Cult Guardian
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] protected a secretive cult devoted to the glow, using [PAWN_possessive] strength to keep outsiders at bay and defend sacred sites.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Forager
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] survived by gathering edible plants and fungi from the most irradiated places, where only the glowing dare tread.

BackstoryDef.title: Glowlight Scout
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent ahead of ghoul groups to scout out safe paths through radioactive wastelands, using [PAWN_possessive] glow as a beacon in the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: Shrine Keeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained a shrine deep within a glowing crater, tending to relics and performing rituals for visiting ghouls.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Hermit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone in the heart of a radioactive wasteland, rarely seeing another soul. [PAWN_pronoun] is self-reliant and wary of outsiders.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Guide
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] led non-ghouls through dangerous glowing zones, charging a hefty fee for [PAWN_possessive] expertise and protection.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Scavenger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] braved the most radioactive ruins to recover valuable salvage, risking [PAWN_possessive] life for rare technology and supplies.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Herbalist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to identify and use rare, mutated plants found only in radioactive zones, brewing potent medicines and poisons.

BackstoryDef.title: Zone Outlaw
BackstoryDef.description: Banished from settlements, [PAWN_nameDef] survived by raiding travelers and hiding in radioactive ruins where few would follow.
